sentences.literal: Its at twelve branches is Chou.
Tiao wind dwells northeast, governs emerge ten thousand things.

sentences.chinese: 條之言條治萬物而出之，故曰條風。
sentences.literal: Tiao of speak arrange govern ten thousand things and emerge it, therefore called Tiao wind.

sentences.chinese: 箕者，言萬物根棋，故曰箕。
sentences.literal: Ji ones, speak ten thousand things roots dispersed, therefore called Ji.
First month also, pitchpipe middle Tai Cu.

sentences.chinese: 泰蔟者，言萬物蔟生也，故曰泰蔟。
sentences.literal: Tai Cu ones, speak ten thousand things clustered live also, therefore called Tai Cu.
Its at twelve branches is Yin.

sentences.chinese: 寅言萬物始生螾然也，故曰寅。
sentences.literal: Yin speak ten thousand things begin live wriggling appearance also, therefore called Yin.

sentences.chinese: 南至於尾，言萬物始生如尾也。
sentences.literal: South until Tail, speak ten thousand things begin live like tail also.

sentences.chinese: 南至於心，言萬物始生有華心也。
sentences.literal: South until Heart, speak ten thousand things begin live have flowery heart also.

sentences.chinese: 房者，言萬物門戶也，至于門則出矣。
sentences.literal: Fang ones, speak ten thousand things door gate also, arrive at gate then emerge already.
Ming Shu ones, bright all things completely emerge also.
